title: Real Sociedad 1-1 Atletico Madrid: Sucic stunner salvages point for hosts
description: Luka Sucic scored a stunning late equaliser to ensure Real Sociedad held Atletico Madrid to a 1-1 home draw in LaLiga on Sunday.
